readable.title: 3344948183_5b89379585
readable.content: A woman , covered in a red and blue shawl , smoking a cigarette , eyes closed . A woman with a black sweatband is wrapped in a blue , red and yellow blanket and is smoking . A woman with a headband wearing a blue , yellow and red hooded jacket . The woman with a colorful blanket is smoking a pipe . The woman wrapped a flag around her body and burned incense .
